[`IOUSBDevice`](/documentation/kernel/iousbdevice)An input/output service object that represents a device on the USB bus.Deprecated[`IOUSBInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iousbinterface)An object that represents an interface of a device on the USB bus.Deprecated[`IOOFPathMatching`](/documentation/kernel/1575304-ioofpathmatching)Deprecated[`IOUSBHostInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iousbhostinterface)Deprecated[`IOUSBHostPipe`](/documentation/kernel/iousbhostpipe)Deprecated[`IOUSBHostIOSource`](/documentation/kernel/iousbhostiosource)Deprecated[`IOUSBHostStream`](/documentation/kernel/iousbhoststream)Deprecated[`IOHIDEventDriver`](/documentation/kernel/iohideventdriver)Deprecated[`IOHIDEventService`](/documentation/kernel/iohideventservice)IOService represents an device or OS service in IOKit and DriverKit.Deprecated[`IOHIDInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iohidinterface)IOService represents an device or OS service in IOKit and DriverKit.Deprecated[`IOHIDSystem`](/documentation/kernel/iohidsystem)Deprecated[`IOHIKeyboardMapper`](/documentation/kernel/iohikeyboardmapper)Deprecated[`IOHIKeyboard`](/documentation/kernel/iohikeyboard)Deprecated[`IOHIPointing`](/documentation/kernel/iohipointing)Deprecated[`IOHIDevice`](/documentation/kernel/iohidevice)Deprecated[`IOHIDElement`](/documentation/kernel/iohidelement)Deprecated[`IOHIDWorkLoop`](/documentation/kernel/iohidworkloop)Deprecated[`IOEthernetInterface`](/documentation/kernel/ioethernetinterface)The Ethernet interface object.Deprecated[`IOEthernetController`](/documentation/kernel/ioethernetcontroller)Abstract superclass for Ethernet controllers.Deprecated
